entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Possible codegen issue with unbox instruction for nullable types #86203
  • error when build native aot with selenium dotnet 7 #86202
  • Update lvSingleDefRegCandidate after CSE to get more candidates for EHwrite thru #86200
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient SSL Connection with Client Certificate Fails After Code Change #86199

Closed

  • OSR tests failing in jit-experimental pipeline #86125
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: AsSpan for Vector128<T>, Vector256<T>m #86204
  • [RyuJit] Allow TYP_BYREF folding. #10132
    Future
  • [wasm] WBT failing to install with `Could not find IncludedWorkloadManifests.txt` because the file was renamed #86192
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid capturing the ExecutionContext for the whole HTTP connection lifetime #86213
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [WIP] Fold const WithElement to CNS_VEC #86212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement AesGcm constructors accepting a tag size and obsolete the existing ones #86211
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add ImmutableArray.Contains overload that accepts an IEqualityCompare… #86210
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve the handling of ToScalar and GetElement(0) #86209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • For Wasi build on windows, do not set CLR_CMAKE_TARGET_WIN32 #86208
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, os-wasi
  • [VM] Fix potential double free #86207
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unmark loop align regardless if we found block to align or not #86198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Wasm] Adjust error message for .NET 7 assemblies, JSExport and multi-threading #86197
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • BashToZero if both locals of `SUB` are same #86196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change CreateObjectFlags.Unwrap to be ComWrappers-instance-specific #86195
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, blocking, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • JIT: do early block merging in more cases #86157
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove char[] allocation from TarHeader #86201
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [JIT]: Inline TLS field access for GC type #85619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove static modifiers from ThreadPool events in NativeRuntimeEventSource.PortableThreadPool.NativeSinks.cs #85563
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [wasm] InstallWorkloadFromArtifacts: remove unnecessary workaround #86191
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Add version info to NativeAOT apps #79623
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clean up impSpanEqualsOrStartsWith #86129
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Enable Vector64 support on arm64 in jit mode. #86188
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Delete the verification type system #86179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Run fgValueNumberConstLoad for invariant loads #86154
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Add a pass of liveness for the new locals inside physical promotion #86043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add fp <--> int conversions to PackedSimd #86143
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use /INCREMENTAL:NO for Debug #86170
    needs-area-label
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Show method names in JitDisasm #86060
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][wasm] marshal-ilgen is dropped when not required #86035
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • Fix WaitForExitAsync could return a cancelled task #85882
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Always expand cctor helpers for NAOT #86147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix receiving of 2nd register in struct #86144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add ToDictionary() overloads for KeyValuePair and ValueTuple kv. #85811
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Enable the "TC_QuickJitForLoops" on LoongArch64. #86022
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Specify NUnit test runner for illink tests #86187
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Constrained mask should take into account busy registers #85933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests to a merged test group #85847
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • GetChromeVersions task: Try to find older versions, if the latest one is #86184
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Trigger relinking if WasmNativeStrip=false #85857
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Enable getting command line from host during suspension #86116
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Enabling AOT wrappers for virtual delegates #85643
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Retrieving new line formatting option #68185

PullRequests

Merged

  • Avoid rooting document instances in NavigateToSearchResult #68068
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Pack bits in SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol into an existing bitflag structure we have for all source methods #68158
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use net8.0 runtime for InlineArray tests #68183
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reuse member names collection in decl tree across edits #67753
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update compiler tool set version in 17.5 #68180

    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #48228
  • CSS isolation support in ASP.NET Core 6.0 for header element #48225
  • Blazor server Cascading Value refreshed wrong #48223
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #48222

Closed

  • Respond to IL2026 warnings in DataProtection originating from EncryptedXml #47695
    8.0-preview5

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove rules associated with the auto-merge label #48227
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Fix HTTP/3 and HTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #47949
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 7.0.7
  • Ensure DataProtection can be used in trimmed apps. #48082
    area-dataprotection, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Uses Fallback When Without Repository #48103
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Improve endpoint metadata debugging #48207
    area-runtime
  • Add initial support for parameters with `AsParameters` attribute #47914
    area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • UI sometimes becomes uninteractive with the mouse after selecting a file from a file input (.NET MAUI Blazor) #15072
  • Unable to add a certificate to iOS keychain #15068
  • Impossible to use MAUI Blazor win app outside of Visual Studio #15067
  • DatePicker无法显示1923年以前的日期 #15066

Closed

  • [Android] Receives the scrolled notification after some delay in horizontal scrolling #5187
    Backlog
  • Different order of Appearing Event and NavigatedTo Event when using Shell ? #7320
    Backlog
  • Large space above and below Carousel View #7472

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix up Compatibility gallery #15020
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Set Icon to null and back again, working around Android issue #13267
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Fix NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActivity #15052
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [ios] fix memory leak in Image #15062
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️
